name: Format\CaptionDescriptor
description: The object used in image components for displaying captions when the image is full-screen.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of Link objects that provide additional information for ranges of the caption text in the text property.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The formatting or markup method applied to the text.

properties.name: inlineTextStyles
properties.description: Array of InlineTextStyle objects to be applied to ranges of the caption’s text.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to display in the caption, including any formatting tags or markup, depending on the format property.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: Either an inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a component text style object that is defined in Article Document.componentText Styles.
